name: WQKFMDBHelper
summary: A class that stores the model to the database, which is based on the encapsulation of FMDB.
description: A class that stores the model to the database, which is based on the encapsulation of FMDB, temporarily does not support direct storage of dictionaries, and more storage types will be updated later.
